Issue.creator: senthil1
Issue.summary: gossip uses static capability instead of dynamic to check for storing pvtData of invalid tx
Issue.description: Currently, we pass a static capability to the gossip which use it to check whether to store the pvtData of invalid tx. With channel updates, the capability does not get updated. Hence, we need to use the channel with bundle listener so that the capability gets updated after a commit of a config update transaction.
